attributes.action: Make halal meat visibally clearly labelled and for restaurants to do the same.
attributes.additional_details: A couple had a weekend break away in a country hotel and discovered that the meat they had been served was halal. This was not advertised prior to their visit , and they were made to feel stupid that they had not asked prior to booking, since when have we had to ask this question?
attributes.background:
People are having choices taken away from them and more and more halal is being sold to us .
Most eateries are also following suit, and is difficult to find non halal places to eat. This is discriminating against people who are not muslim.
